Class.Name: Fighter
Class.Description: Fighters are warriors who specialize in different forms of combat. Fighters can range from skilled warriors and blademasters to devious mercenaries and brutish thugs.

Class.Name: Berserker
Class.Description: Berserkers are savage warriors who go into violent rages where they can deal damage quickly. They most often come from barbarian clans.

Class.Name: Paladin
Class.Description: Paladins are holy warriors. They tend to either be part of holy orders, retainers to lords or wandering crusader knights.

Class.Name: Blackguard
Class.Description: Blackguards are fiendish warriors who dabble in necromancy and dealing with dark powers.

Class.Name: Ranger
Class.Description: Rangers are warriors who are at home in nature. They make excellent trackers and archers.

Class.Name: Spellsword
Class.Description: Spellswords are warriors who combine their martial efforts with magical ones, often concentrating on spells that make them better and quicker warriors.

Class.Name: Adventurer
Class.Description: Adventurers are jack of all trades characters who can fight, have some rogue skills and very limited magical abilities.

Class.Name: Thief
Class.Description: Thieves range from nimble catburglers and pickpockets to conmen to violent robbers. They might not actually steal from others, but they learn rogue skills faster than any other class and start out with points in all the main rogue skills.

Class.Name: Bard
Class.Description: Bards specialize in entertaining and persuading others with their rogue and spellcasting skills. Bards can use magic instruments as a unique form of magic. They can also cast lower level spells from the arcane, mind and divine spellbooks.

Class.Name: Assassin
Class.Description: Assassins are warrior-rogues skilled in tracking, hunting and killing their prey. They get access to the restricted skill Deathstrike which can cause instant kills.

Class.Name: Spy
Class.Description: Spies are specialized rogues who excel in getting information others want kept secret through persuasion, subterfuge or violence. They combine rogue skills with limited access to the mentalist spellbook which lets them influence others.

Class.Name: Swashbuckler
Class.Description: Swashbucklers are quick and nimble characters who combine the skills of a rogue with the combat skills of a warrior. They rely on their wits and their agility in combat.

Class.Name: Mage
Class.Description: Mages are an arcane spellcasting class. They are renowned as powerful wizards and archmages who specialize in elemental magic.

Class.Name: Warlock
Class.Description: Warlocks are spellcasters who use infernal magic. They deal in diabolical plots and the trading and working of souls.

Class.Name: Necromancer
Class.Description: Necromancers are dark spellcasters who specialize in necromantic magic to create, influence and possibly even become undead. They can also use scythes in combat.

Class.Name: Priest
Class.Description: Priests are divine spellcasters who specialize in healing and protecting others.

Class.Name: Druid
Class.Description: Druids are nature spellcasters, they protect and guard the wild places of the world.

Class.Name: Psionic
Class.Description: Psionics are mentalist spellcasters, they specialize in reading, controlling and destroying the minds of others.

Class.Name: Monster
Class.Description: Holder class for monsters that do not have levels in a real class.
